mapper.update:
UPDATE `base_community_device` SET
`equipment_photos` = #{set.equipmentPhotos},
`name` = #{set.name},
`type` = #{set.type},
`sn` = #{set.sn},
`number` = #{set.number},
`model` = #{set.model},
`specifications` = #{set.specifications},
`manufacturer` = #{set.manufacturer},
`out_time` = #{set.outTime},
`install_time` = #{set.installTime},
`install_address` = #{set.installAddress},
`manufacturer_contacts` = #{set.manufacturerContacts},
`manufacturer_contacts_number` = #{set.manufacturerContactsNumber},
`location_info` = #{set.locationInfo},
`status` = #{set.status},
`audit_scope` = #{set.auditScope},
`community_id` = #{set.communityId},
`community_org_id` = #{set.communityOrgId},
`create_by` = #{set.createBy},
`create_time` = #{set.createTime},
`update_by` = #{set.updateBy},
`update_time` = #{set.updateTime},
`remark` = #{set.remark},
`del_flag` = #{set.delFlag},
`id` in
#{item}
and
(
`Id` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Id` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and

#{item}

`out_time` <= #{where.outTimeEd} and

and
